PTU therapy (Phenylthiouracil therapy) is not a disease, it's a therapy used to treat certain conditions.

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CONCLUSIONS : PTU therapy may be related to the appearance of MPO - ANCA , but MPO - ANCA does not appear to be closely related to vasculitis .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| PTU (Phenylthiouracil) |
| MPO (Myeloperoxidase) |
| ANCA (Antineutrophil Cytoplasmic Antibodies) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| PTU (Phenylthiouracil) |
| MPO (Myeloperoxidase) |

In the original paragraph, "PTU therapy" refers to the use of Phenylthiouracil as a treatment, and "MPO - ANCA" refers to the presence of Antineutrophil Cytoplasmic Antibodies against Myeloperoxidase. Both PTU and MPO-ANCA are chemical entities.
